nodes.text: Nan was a female human and member of the Nihil who lived during the High Republic Era. She joined the pirate organization along with her parents when she was a child. After her parents' deaths, she became the ward of the elder Nihil Hague, who taught her how to fight cleverly to make up for her small stature. When she and Hague were stranded at an ancient space station after the Great Hyperspace Disaster, the two concealed their identities as Nihil while taking refuge alongside multiple other starships.

Nan first appeared in the young-adult novel The High Republic: Into the Dark, which was written by Claudia Gray and published in 2021 as part of the Star Wars: The High Republic publishing series. She was first pictured in concept art showcased during the fourth episode of the web series Star Wars: The High Republic Show on July 28, 2021.
